name: SkyInk
description:
SkyInk

SkyInk is the game I coded, which is also to be downloaded to the home pages of Sopuli & Murmeli Games.

If you want to challenge me and yourself. You have to beat my record in the game which is 4711 points, after which I try to win the highest score sent to me. You can send me your points on Sopuli & Murmeli Games Discord server. Please send your records on photo.

Here is the joining link to our Discord server: https://discord.gg/j76hwaQ
